Gyeltang or Gyalthang town and county, former name of Shangri-La county 香格里拉縣|香格里拉县[Xiang1 ge2 li3 la1 xian4] in Dêqên or Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Yunnan

sentences.english: Zhongdian airport only consists of a very small but modern building for check-in.
sentences.chinese: 中甸的機場只有一座小小但現代化的建築物。

sentences.english: Tibetan, Zhongdian County, with city names "Reunion were" consistent.
sentences.chinese: 它與中甸縣古城藏語地名“尼旺宗”相一致。

sentences.english: I heard from my amateur friends that there were a few hams in Diqing Zhongdian.
sentences.chinese: 我聽到我的業餘朋友有在迪慶中甸一些火腿。

sentences.english: Next to it is one of the best grazing lands in Zhongdian.
sentences.chinese: 湖畔是中甸最好的牧場之一。

sentences.english: Northeast of Deqin County, Zhongdian City, Southwest China's Yunnan Province.
sentences.chinese: 位於雲南省中甸市德欽縣東北部。

sentences.english: Along the way to Zhongdian, suddenly a wide river appears on the left-hand side of the road.
sentences.chinese: 在去中甸的途中，公路的左側突然出現了一條大河。
